Articles.Content: Nice find with the track marks! Maybe weÃ‚Â´ll see some aliens eventually... It would also be a great detail for when IVA:s get implemented =) Imagine driving around with a Munrover and actually leave track marks around your Munbase!
And Kerbal inside
Say what-the, what is it you're calling attention to in that pic? I'm afraid I don't see anything.

Just a friendly reminder guys, if you post large or many images (and especially many large ones), please use spoilers.

A good idea is to post one image, <1024px as the main image in the open, and more detailed pics in a spoiler.

Say what-the, what is it you're calling attention to in that pic? I'm afraid I don't see anything.

I don't either.
I'm not sure if this what he's referring to, but there might be a creeper face in the shadows near the perigee.

I don't either.

The "creeper" from minecraft is in the top left area of minmus. Hope that helps...

Ah that's why, I don't play minecraft.

I like the idea, but I just can't stand the terrible graphics.

Minecraft doesnt have terrible graphics, its graphics are reminiscent of 8-bit times. I honestly love 8-bit.

But lets not derail thread, now.
Waaaait.. there's more than just one Munolith?

Minecraft doesnt have terrible graphics, its graphics are reminiscent of 8-bit times. I honestly love 8-bit.

But lets not derail thread, now.

Not to derail, but one last comment, from my perspective...8 bit hurts my eyes.

Waaaait.. there's more than just one Munolith?

They are all over the place, on Kerbin, Mun and Minmus.
:| Time to fire up the game again... And here I was wondering what you guys spend all your time on..

i wish the muncastle was actually somewhere on the mun, much much harder to spot than munarches or munoliths.

Like you'd have to know where it is and still then after landing on the mun search around a bit until you find the object that's only 0.3 kerbals high

location? O.o

Try to find it yourself! ;-P But if you really wish...

It's on the near side of Minmus, right in the center of it. I wonder if there's more?

Try to find it yourself! ;-P But if you really wish...

It's on the near side of Minmus, right in the center of it. I wonder if there's more?

Nope, Nova has confirmed that there are 5 on Kerbin, 3 on the Mun, and 1 on Minmus.

Nope, Nova has confirmed that there are 5 on Kerbin, 3 on the Mun, and 1 on Minmus.

I'm talking about track prints, not monoliths.
could some one to pm the coordinates, so i can make autom8 scripts to locate them
Jeez, all I ever find are old trashed rocket parts left behind by my inept attempts to land.... could someone PM me the coords to a arch so I can start setting up a MunBase?

Jeez, all I ever find are old trashed rocket parts left behind by my inept attempts to land.... could someone PM me the coords to a arch so I can start setting up a MunBase?

I think there's one at around the top-right of the giant dark crater on the kerbin-facing side of the Mun, at about 1 O'clock.

If anyone can provide me with an image from the map screen of a ship parked at a monolith on the Mun, I'd be very happy, however. Every single crater I've explored that I reckon it's in - nothing.

I am back now. I will install 0.16 today or tomorrow and partipicate in the search for easter eggs.

To preserve the fun and curiosity factor of the game KSP players who have found that sites shall keep there exact coordinates secret from new users.

Its ok to show of pictures but you should hide informations about there positions.

I was flying around in my spaceplane and I saw a mun rock! In the sea! I have never seen anything like this on the forums, in the ocean or anywhere on Kerin, but it looks like a mun rock to me. As you can see just under the plane is a rock. Is this normal?
weird but if you build a submarine kerbin has underwater features like walls.
